resources.string:
This is a prototype, rough cut, early beta or version 0.1 of an idea. 

 All feedback welcome: 
 sight.words.reader@gmail.com 

 What do you want to see more of? 

 Roadmap:
 - change words in the list
 - create your own lists
 - share your lists with other parents
 - more content
 - better images
 - animations
 - create your own eBooks
 - statistics
